name: Gannon
description:
Gannon, a game where you shoot Ganondorf out of a cannon.

This game was originally made by my high school friend Dalton Cutter. He asked for some help fixing and improving the game, so I fixed most of the bugs, implemented the power-ups, wave system, enemies, etc.

The game also is a bit of copyright-infringement due to the JPEGs of Ganondorf  and the environment that's used and music that's ripped, but I don't think anyone really cares for this silly, inoffensive high school student game.

To play, just use your mouse to point-and-shoot. Survive for as long as possible. Use the power-ups, Luke.
